description: Tossed in a white sauce and cheese, this macaroni pasta bake recipe is layered with passata, mozzarella and tomato. Try it for a delicious family dinner.
name: Mozzarella, Tomato & Basil Macaroni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pasta mixture in a greased 2-litre capacity baking dish. Smooth top. Spoon passata over pasta mixture. Scatter with mozzarella and top with tomato. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve scattered with basil.
